Class EconomyAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.TownyObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WarSpoils

    public class EconomyAccount
extends TownyObject
    Economy object which provides an interface with the Economy Handler.
    Author:
    ElgarL, Shade, Suneet Tipirneni (Siris)

      • pay

        public boolean pay(double amount,
                   String reason)
            throws EconomyException
        Tries to pay from the players holdings
        Parameters:
        amount - value to deduct from the player's account
        reason - leger memo stating why amount is deducted
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        EconomyException - if the transaction fails

      • collect

                throws EconomyException

        Parameters:

        reason - memo regarding transaction
        Returns:
        collected or pay to server account
        Throws:
        EconomyException - if transaction fails

      • payTo

        public boolean payTo(double amount,
                     EconomyHandler collector,
                     String reason)
              throws EconomyException
        When one account is paying another account(Taxes/Plot Purchasing)
        Parameters:
        amount - currency to be collected
        collector - recipient of transaction
        reason - memo regarding transaction
        Returns:
        true if successfully payed amount to collector.
        Throws:
        EconomyException - if transaction fails
